org.opendaylight.controller.md.sal.binding.api

Interface ReadOnlyTransaction

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AsyncReadOnlyTransaction<org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.binding.InstanceIdentifier<?>,org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.binding.DataObject>, AsyncReadTransaction<org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.binding.InstanceIdentifier<?>,org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.binding.DataObject>, AsyncTransaction<org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.binding.InstanceIdentifier<?>,org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.binding.DataObject>, java.lang.AutoCloseable, org.opendaylight.yangtools.concepts.Identifiable<java.lang.Object>, ReadTransaction

    public interface ReadOnlyTransaction
extends ReadTransaction, AsyncReadOnlyTransaction<org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.binding.InstanceIdentifier<?>,org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.binding.DataObject>
    A transaction that provides a stateful read-only view of the data tree.

    For more information on usage and examples, please see the documentation in AsyncReadTransaction.
